sn12.39:4.2: “Yañca, bhikkhave, ceteti yañca pakappeti yañca anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12.39:4.4: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe virūḷhe nāmarūpassa avakkanti hoti.
sn12.39:5.1: No ce, bhikkhave, ceteti no ce pakappeti, atha ce anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12.39:5.3: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe virūḷhe nāmarūpassa avakkanti hoti.
sn12.39:6.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, no ceva ceteti no ca pakappeti no ca anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ na hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12.39:6.2: Ārammaṇe asati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn12.39:6.3: Tadappatiṭṭhite viññāṇe avirūḷhe nāmarūpassa avakkanti na hoti.
